com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest

Class ClientManager.LoginOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest.ClientManager.LoginOptions
  • Enclosing class:
    ClientManager

    public static class ClientManager.LoginOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Class encapsulating login options. There are passed in a bundle to the auth service, which passes them as "extras" when starting the login activity.
